Sentencas: This work is a study of the effect of co-doping (ZrO2)(0.9)(Sc2O3)(0.1) solid solution with yttria and/or ceria on the phase composition, local structure and transport properties of the crystals.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of zirconia crystals co-doped by scandia, ceria and yttria

Sentencas: The solid solution crystals were grown using directional melt crystallization in cold crucible.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of zirconia crystals co-doped by scandia, ceria and yttria

Sentencas: We show that ceria co-doping of the crystals does not stabilize the high-temperature cubic phase in the entire crystal bulk, unlike yttria codoping.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of zirconia crystals co-doped by scandia, ceria and yttria

Sentencas: Ceria co-doping of the (ZrO2)(0.9)(Sc2O3)(0.1) crystals increases their conductivity, whereas the addition of 1 mol.% yttria tangibly reduces the conductivity.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of zirconia crystals co-doped by scandia, ceria and yttria

Sentencas: Equimolar co-doping of the (ZrO2)(0.9)(Sc2O3)(0.1) crystals with ceria and yttria changes the conductivity but slightly.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of zirconia crystals co-doped by scandia, ceria and yttria

Sentencas: Optical spectroscopy of the local structure of the crystals identified different types of optical centers.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of zirconia crystals co-doped by scandia, ceria and yttria

Sentencas: We found that the fraction of the trivalent cations having a vacancy in the first coordination sphere in the ceria co-doped crystals is smaller compared with that in the yttria co-doped crystals.
Titulo: Structure and transport properties of zirconia crystals co-doped by scandia, ceria and yttria
